name: IsoGen
description:
Synopsis

Embark on a (short) epic adventure to save your village.

Sacrifice your positive memories to overcome your enemies.

And move between physical space and mind space to achieve your goal!

Note

If the game seems sluggish or unresponsive, please wait for a little bit for the game to download its audio assets and then refresh the page.

Controls

Rotate Left: [A] [Left Arrow]

Rotate Right: [D]  [Right Arrow]

Move Forward: [W] [Up Arrow]

Move Backwards: [D] [Down Arrow]

Ctrl+R: Restart the game

Mobile: Swipe to move / Interact

Hints

1. If you get lost, follow the banners!

2. Combat is attritional, it gets harder to win the more fights you find yourself in.

3. Keep an eye out for secret areas. They may contain something that will make your journey easier.

Game

Made for the Dungeon Crawler Game Jam 2023: https://itch.io/jam/dcjam2023 

Theme: The theme of the jam was Duality. So naturally, I chose to hit the theme in two different ways.

1. In regards, to the spaces that the player inhabits as he moves through the game

2. In regards to the player's motivations and the combat mechanics.

And as an additional flavour, I also included a bit of symbolism in the game.
